title: The most frequent daily users of social media
summary: This graph shows the users of social media per Age Group , from 15 years to 64 years .
social media users is greatest amongst 45 - 54 cohort ( 150 Minutes a day ) , followed by 15 - 24 Age cohort ( 125 Minutes ) .
The Group with the most amount of time on social media are 25 - 34 and 35 - 44 , both of which spend only 75 Minutes a day on social media .
gold: The graph compares the daily minutes spent on social media by users from 5 ages groups . The overall age range is from 15 to 64 years . Users aged 45 - 54 are the most frequent daily users with an average of 150 minutes spent on social media .
